LINKAGE.FBIG_BODY: Log in to your Facebook account. Log in to your Facebook account and select the linked Instagram account.
LINKAGE.GMB_BODY: Log in to your Google account. The managed Google Business Profile account will be displayed, so select and link. * Requires a Google Business Profile administrator

MODAL.TITLE: Select the Facebook page you want to link to.

PHRASE.TITLE: Title
PHRASE.LINK_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: Link name (e.g. click here to make a reservation)
PHRASE.LINK_TEXT_GBP: When linking postings to GBP, a link button can be added to the latest information postings.
PHRASE.LINK_TEXT_LINE: When linking posts to LINE Officials, a link button can be added to the latest information postings.
